Title: An Iconic, Draconic Look
Description:
I am sure your arrival in Orgrimmar drew the attention of its citizens. No doubt some were more comfortable in your presence than others.

When I was a young dragon, I took on the mortal visage you now see. It allowed me to live among the tauren of Highmountain as an ally.

Though your path differs from mine, the essence of dragonkind flows through you as well, $p. Perhaps that will allow you to assume a visage of your own.

Let us walk together.
